item.title: CVE-2024-48023|2024-10-17T13:01:43.645Z -- restaurantconnect%2C%20inc -- restaurant%20reservations%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in RestaurantConnect, Inc Restaurant Reservations Widget allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Restaurant Reservations Widget: from n/a through 1.0.
